name: Green Audit AI
description: Green Audit AI helps small businesses automatically analyze their operational data and identify cost-effective sustainability improvements. It provides personalized action plans and connects them with vetted providers for implementation.

name: SkillStack AI
description: SkillStack AI is a micro-learning platform that uses AI to curate personalized, skill-based learning paths for small business employees, improving team performance and driving revenue growth. name: SkillStack AI
description: SkillStack AI connects small businesses with vetted, AI-powered micro-services created by expert AI prompt engineers. It allows businesses to quickly automate tasks, improve efficiency, and access niche expertise without hiring full-time AI specialists.

name: EcoVest Insights
description: EcoVest Insights helps small businesses automatically track and improve their sustainability metrics for better financing opportunities. We provide data-driven insights linking eco-friendly practices to cost savings and improved access to green loans and grants.

name: Mindful Margin

name: SkillCap Tax
description: SkillCap Tax is a micro-SaaS platform that automatically optimizes tax deductions for freelancers and small businesses based on their educational expenses and professional development activities. It connects to existing accounting software and suggests eligible deductions, maximizing tax savings and minimizing audit risk.

name: FundFlow AI
description: FundFlow AI automates financial forecasting and cash flow management for small businesses using AI-powered scenario planning and integrates directly with existing accounting software. name: Clarity Credit
description: Clarity Credit is a B2B SaaS platform that automatically analyzes a small business's financial data and provides personalized, actionable insights to improve their credit score and unlock better financing options. name: Mindful Meetings
description: Mindful Meetings helps small businesses run productive and stress-free meetings. We use AI to analyze meeting transcripts, identify potential sources of conflict, and suggest mindful communication techniques to improve team dynamics and overall well-being.

name: Climate Credit AI

name: MoodBoost Teams

name: EthicalVest AI

name: EcoCode Assist
description: EcoCode Assist helps small businesses reduce their carbon footprint by providing AI-powered suggestions for energy-efficient coding practices and optimizing cloud infrastructure. name: Niche Networker
description: Niche Networker helps small businesses build hyper-targeted online communities around their specific expertise, driving leads and brand authority. We automate community creation and moderation with AI, allowing businesses to focus on engaging their ideal customers.

name: Ecofluence Audit

name: EcoScript AI
